The second is the current state of the Country Music industry. With Nashville as a hub, these two conversations create a coherent theme.

With respect to family, we see Jennings embracing his bloodlines in a manner that is uncommon for artists who are the progeny of legends. Typically the children of famous entertainers either distance themselves from their parents (often to the point of disdain), or crumble under the weight of their name.
